question: find the c . i . on a sum of rs . 2000 for 6 months at 20 % per annum , interest being compounded quarterly ?

it takes joey the postman 1 hours to run a 1 mile long route every day . he delivers packages and then returns to the post office along the same path . if the average speed of the round trip is 5 mile / hour , what is the speed with which joey returns ?
if the cost price is 75 % of selling price then what is the profit percentage .

in an election between two candidates a and b , the number of valid votes received by a exceeds those received by b by 15 % of the total number of votes polled . if 20 % of the votes polled were invalid and a total of 6720 votes were polled , then how many valid votes did b get ?

a store ’ s selling price of $ 2500 for a certain printer would yield a profit of 40 percent of the store ’ s cost for the printer . what selling price would yield a profit of 50 percent of the printer ’ s cost ?
steve traveled the first 2 hours of his journey at 40 mph and the last 3 hours of his journey at 90 mph . what is his average speed of travel for the entire journey ?
running at the same constant rate , 6 identical machines can produce a total of 270 bottles per minute . at this rate , how many bottles could 12 such machines produce in 4 minutes ?
the total of 324 of 20 paise and 25 paise make a sum of rs . 70 . the no of 20 paise coins is

the entrance fee for a fair is $ 5 for persons under the age of 18 , and 20 % more for persons older . each ride at the fair costs $ 0.50 . if joe goes with her 6 years old twin brothers , and they each took 3 rides in total . how much money does joe end up spending at the fair ?
20 men do a work in 20 days . how many men are needed to finish the work in 5 days ?
if the numbers 1 to 95 are written on 95 pieces of paper , ( one on each ) and one piece is picked at random , then what is the probability that the number drawn is neither prime nor composite ?

the weights of one liter vegetable ghee packet of two brands ‘ a ’ and ‘ b ’ are 900 gm and 850 gm respectively . if they are mixed in the ratio of 3 : 2 by volumes to form a mixture of 4 liters , what is the weight ( in kg ) of the mixture ?
if n is a prime number greater than 7 , what is the remainder when n ^ 2 is divided by 12 ?

there is a total of 84 marbles in a box , each of which is red , green , blue , or white . if one marble is drawn from the box at random , the probability that it will be white is 1 / 4 and the probability that it will be green is 2 / 7 . what is the probability that the marble will be either red or blue ?
a , b and c enter into a partnership . a invests 3 times as much as b invests and 2 / 3 of what c invests . at the end of the year , the profit earned is rs . 66000 . what is the share of c ?

last week john spent 30 percent of his wages on recreation . this week , his wages are 25 percent less than last week ʼ s wages and he spent 20 percent of his wages on recreation . the amount he spends on recreation this week is what percent of the amount he spent on recreation last week ?
the diagonals of two squares are in the ratio of 2 : 5 then find the ratio of its areas ?

the average salary / head of all the workers in a workshop is rs . 700 , if the average salary / head of 5 technician is rs . 800 and the average salary / head of the rest is rs . 650 , the total no . of workers in the work - shop is ?

the speed of a railway engine is 96 km per hour when no compartment is attached , and the reduction in speed is directly proportional to the square root of the number of compartments attached . if the speed of the train carried by this engine is 24 km per hour when 9 compartments are attached , the maximum number of compartments that can be carried by the engine is :

a car ferry can hold up to 70 tons of cargo . what is the greatest number of vehicles that the ferry can carry if half the vehicles are cars with an average ( arithmetic mean ) weight of 0.75 tons and half of the vehicles are trucks with an average ( arithmetic mean ) weight of 6 tons ?

two assembly line inspectors , lauren and steven , inspect widgets as they come off the assembly line . if lauren inspects every fifth widget , starting with the fifth , and steven inspects every third , starting with the third , how many of the 98 widgets produced in the first hour of operation are not inspected by either inspector ?
what is the remainder when 7777 * 8888 * 101010 is divided by 33

in the xy - plane the point ( - 2 - 3 ) is the centre of a circle , the point ( - 2 , 2 ) lies inside the circle and the point ( 5 , - 3 ) lies outside the circle . if the radius r of the circle r is an integer then r =

two different primes may be said torhymearound an integer if they are the same distance from the integer on the number line . for instance , 3 and 7 rhyme around 5 . what integer r between 1 and 20 , inclusive , has the greatest number of distinct rhyming primes around it ?
a man can row downstream at 26 kmph and upstream at 22 kmph . find the speed of the man in still water and the speed of stream respectively ?
how many integers from 0 to 50 inclusive have a remainder of 3 when divided by 8 ?

a cylinder with 6 meter radius and 12 meter height is filled to capacity with water . if the content of the cylinder is used to fill several smaller cylinders of 4 meter diameter and 8 meter height , how many smaller cylinders will be filled to capacity ?
find the length of the wire required to go 10 times round a square field containing 53824 m 2 .
the population of a town is 7600 . it decreases annually at the rate of 10 % p . a . what was its population 2 years ago ?
a student has to obtain 30 % of the total marks to pass . he got 150 marks and failed by 30 marks . the maximum marks are ?
john makes $ 60 a week from his job . he earns a raise andnow makes $ 80 a week . what is the % increase ?
the sum of two numbers is 184 . if one - third of the one exceeds one - seventh of the other by 8 , find the smaller number .
a sum was put a simple interest at a certain rate for 3 years . had it been put at 3 % higher rate , it would have fetched rs . 90 more . the sum is :
a man can do a piece of work in 5 days , but with the help of his son , he can finish it in 3 days . in what time can the son do it alone ?
16 machines can do a work in 10 days . how many machines are needed to complete the work in 40 days ?

a rectangular parking space is marked out by painting three of its sides . if the length of the unpainted side is 99 feet , and the sum of the lengths of the painted sides is 37 feet , find out the area of the parking space in square feet ?

a man cycling along the road noticed that every 18 minutes a bus overtakes him and every 6 minutes he meets an oncoming bus . if all buses and the cyclist move at a constant speed , what is the time interval between consecutive buses ?
rs . 2500 is divided into two parts such that if one part be put out at 5 % simple interest and the other at 6 % , the yearly annual income may be rs . 125 . how much was lent at 5 % ?
how many seconds will a 600 m long train take to cross a man walking with a speed of 4 km / hr in the direction of the moving train if the speed of the train is 64 km / hr ?
find the sum lend at c . i . at 5 p . c per annum will amount to rs . 240 in 2 years ?
if x : y = 2 : 9 , find the value of ( 2 x + 2 y ) : ( 5 x – y )
what is the least number by which 16800 must be divided to get a number perfect square
a 50 cm long wire is to be cut into two pieces so that one piece will be 2 / 5 th of the other , how many centimeters will the shorter piece be ?
an outlet pipe can empty 2 / 3 of a cistern in 12 minutes . in 4 minutes , what part of the cistern will be emptied ?
in an aquarium there is 14 purple fish , 8 orange fish , 12 pink fish , 3 golden fish . how many fish are there in an aquarium ?
a can complete the job in 3 hours and b can complete the same job in 3 hours . a works for 1 hour and then b joins and both complete the job . what fraction of the job did b complete
the speed of a boat in still water in 20 km / hr and the rate of current is 5 km / hr . the distance travelled downstream in 24 minutes is :
